Articles.Content:
How is the weather where you are today?

It is a beautiful, sunny morning here and promises to be a gorgeous spring day.

Happy landings!

Lovely sunny afternoon.

Almost clear blue sky and a whopping +7C.

(But there was a smidgen of snow on the ground when I woke up :/ )
We're in the sunny portion of spring, I expect more rain soon; Eugene never lets me down there...

It's noon and it's raining.

Probably gonna snow tomorrow and Monday.

Yesterday was kind of sunny though.

This brings up an interesting question.

This board is called the Lounge but technically it's General KSP Discussion. Do the mods move the thread to the actual lounge, or follow the names and keep it here?

(Warm with clear skies where I am btw)
Was snowing this morning.

2 minutes ago, KerbonautInTraining said:

This brings up an interesting question.

This board is called the Lounge but technically it's General KSP Discussion. Do the mods move the thread to the actual lounge, or follow the names and keep it here?

(Warm with clear skies where I am btw)

What an interesting question on such an auspicious day.

Happy landings!
It's a sunny clear day where I am, however knowing Kansas weather it won't last long.

The weather here is gaseous and opaque, has temperature and smells well... like nitrogen and oxygen... and other stuff. It moves direction SSE actually with some 1-3m/s.

Edited April 1, 2016 by Mikki
Typo;D
Sunny, warm and forecast 19 here today - which is VERY unseasonable. I plan on sitting in a lawn chair with beer and watching the snow melt off the hills.
Weather today is predicted to be partly cloudy with a 95% chance of trolling and misinformation.

1 minute ago, Red Iron Crown said:

Weather today is predicted to be partly cloudy with a 95% chance of trolling and misinformation.

'Partly cloudy' as in risk of haze?

Today is cloudy, muggy, and cool. 

Yesterday was sunny, warm., and beautiful. 

I'd much rather be back in yesterday, as much for the weather as for avoiding the massive troll-fest today.
Gothenburg is rockig some serious sun and almost clear skies. Just below 10 degrees celsius.

Just now, Curveball Anders said:

'Partly cloudy' as in risk of haze?

As in risk of rocket plumes.  Sooty kerosene exhaust, etc...  Or a UDMH/NTO fireball if you're a Протон hater...
Clear and sunny, sure to be in the 70s F by this afternoon.
74°F, optimum humidity, nearly pitch dark except for the glow of my monitors. I can confirm that the office climate control system has not broken down.

7 minutes ago, Red Iron Crown said:

Weather today is predicted to be partly cloudy with a 95% chance of trolling and misinformation.

*pat pats* It's OK, someday the beta will be over and this will all be a distant, horrible memory clouded by an alcohol haze.
The weather has been odly warm the entire winter.
Foggy and rainy for the last few days, but we had two weeks of beautiful clean weather before that
Warm and breezey. In fact, I'm at school and don't even know.
Sunny, with 90% chance of politics.

I like weathers, especially on days like these!

#sunniness

Sunny, 55 degrees Fahrenheit and climbing.

I love Oregon!

... On a vaguely related note, I was on Crater Lake in 64 degree weather, and there was still snow on the ground. Anyone know what might cause that?
Was snowing last week, (-5 Celsius (23 Fahrenheit)) and is now +18 Celsius (64 Fahrenheit). Good ol' Albtera! There MAY still be a snow yet to come this spring
